attributes.action: Chuck Chequers, & replace Theresa May with a PM who will give us Brexit not BINO
attributes.background: In 2016 we had a long awaited referendum on leaving the EU, and Leave won. Unfortunately our PM came up with the Chequers blueprint.  It ties us into everything we wanted out of, the Customs Union, Single Market and ECJ. It does not give us a good deal, it will cost us £40 billion to be worse off.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be sacked.

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/220073
